creator: tjstankus@yahoo.com
text:
Release 2002-07-10. Start JMeter. Without doing anything esle, select Run | 
Start, then select Run | Stop. A dialog comes up with the title "Stopping 
Tests" and reads "Shutting down all test threads. Please be patient." The 
application hangs with that dialog box displayed.

I would think that the Run | Start menu option would be disabled if there isn't 
anything to run.

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
